Entry.JapaneseText: こんなでっかい塔、 どうやって建てたんだろうネ？
Entry.EnglishText: How did they build a tower this big?

Entry.JapaneseText: 古代の人々が作ったらしいけど…… こんなもの本当に<Yellow>ヒト<White>が作れんのか？
Entry.EnglishText: It seems like it was built by ancient people, but... Was this place really made by <Yellow>Humans<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: だとすると、<Yellow>ヒト<White>が作った塔に 聖獣がいる事になるな……ううむ……
Entry.EnglishText: And if that were the case, then a Sacred Beast would be residing in a <Yellow>Man<White>-made tower... Hmm...

Entry.JapaneseText: そういう気まぐれな聖獣もいるんだろ？ それとも本当は聖獣が作ったとか？
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe this Sacred Beast did it on a whim? Or perhaps the Sacred Beast built it themselves?
